means: 静静躲藏着地，一动也不动地

sentence.Network_en: The escaped prisoners lay doggo in a haystack until the searchers had gone away.
sentence.Network_cn: 越狱的囚犯们一直躲在干草堆里,直到搜寻者离去.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: of obscure origin; apparently from dog + -o

auth_sentence.content: But party members and the trade unions effectively lay doggo so as not to rock the boat.
